name: Spectral Pursuit
description:
Spectral Pursuit is a Local Player vs play game built for the Vive, In virtual reality you play as an Exorcist trying to capture a ghost that is running around your house causing havoc. Use your abilities and wit to outsmart the ghost and capture him in one of your handy capture bottles.

Playing as the Ghost you have to brew a potion with ingredients scattered all over the house to win the game. Possess the objects and bring them over to cauldrons and drop them in to brew the potion.

This game is a student project created at Edmonton Digital Arts College, This game was built in unity across 7 weeks.

Assets used:

  • Haunted Mansion - Bit Gem
  • Universal Sound FX
  • Ultimate Game Music Collection
  • Cartoon FX - JMO Assets
  • Necromancer GUI
